name: Voice Leadership: Fundamentals, Techniques & Application for the Public Speaker
base_name: Voice Leadership: Fundamentals, Techniques & Application for the Public Speaker
long_desc: In this course students will learn valuable strategies, techniques and solutions regarding public speaking, the professional voice and interpersonal relationships. Each week will cover a key topic with theory and strategy laid out in lecture form. Students will prepare spoken and written assignments based on the key topics.

custom_fields.goals: A more profound sense of understanding about the voice, its use in effective public, professional and leadership settings
custom_fields.key_topics: Strategies in public speaking, understanding your voice, persuasion and influence, interpersonal relationships, building confidence in speech writing, discovering one's authentic sound, writing speeches for your voice, effective pitches, dynamics range and cadence.
custom_fields.learning_resources: Selected readings and videos as assigned in class.
